description:
To confront Sultan Vinegar at the Distillery, Chup and comrades first must cross paths with VamPIEr, the terror of the moonlit back alley. They suit up, so to speak, with their secret weapon. However, the potent backfire has unintended consequences on the enemy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: なんてったってヴァンパイアハンター
